## Persistable interface

A resource that can be persisted to a file

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Persistable 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [name](./workflow.persistable.name.md) |  | string | The custom name to use, will be persisted under <code>apps/</code> folder. This may specify a sub-path: e.g. (<code>my-fancy-app/data.json</code>) |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [load(data)](./workflow.persistable.load.md) | Read persisted data from a blob |
|  [save()](./workflow.persistable.save.md) | Save the persistable data into a blob |
